actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee with an amendment. With written report No. 105-350.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 659.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to make corrections to a map relating to the Coastal Barrier Resources System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make corrections to a specified Coastal Barrier Resources map as necessary to move the boundary of the otherwise-protected area to the Cape Henlopen Sate Park boundary to the extent necessary to exclude from the otherwise- protected area the adjacent property leased by the Barcroft Company and Cape Shores Associates, privately held corporations under the law of the State of Delaware, and to include in the otherwise-protected area the northeastern corner of Cape Henlopen State Park seaward of the Lewes and Rehoboth Canal.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to make corrections to a map relating to the Coastal Barrier Resources System.
